Module org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.bootstrap

Interface Modal

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface Modal
extends BootstrapElement<Tag,​Modal>

    Pavel

      • bindTrigger

        void bindTrigger​(HTMLElement<?> trigger)
        Adds data-toggle="modal" data-target="#<modal id>" attributes to the trigger. Generates model id if it is not set.
        Parameters:
        trigger -
